Reviews.Title: Inconsistent - does not have LCD screen
Reviews.Author: King Lou
Reviews.Content: First of all, the item description is incorrect.  This unit does not have an LCD screen, nor is the screen flat.  It uses a mini projection CRT that projects up at the curved screen surface.  Consequently, there is distortion of the image (stretched on the edges), and definitely not high-res.  Also, the manual claims a larger field of view angle than it actually has.  I'm an engineer and I measured it to be about 40 degrees across the center of the screen.  Consequently, you won't see that much of your visitor and there may be a problem viewing both short and tall visitors.  Well, the item is pretty inexpensive at just $92, so all this might be excusable, but there were also a serious functional problem.  The doorbell button on the camera would not work correctly up to 50% of the time.  I had to return the unit as defective.

Reviews.Title: Doorbell view
Reviews.Author: joeyp
Reviews.Content: The picture is good.Installation easy.My complaint is: Someone at your door must push the button for you to see them.I would like to be able to turn the camera on from inside my house.I would like to be able to start the conversation from in the house if they don't push the talk button.  With this system I can't.

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: It does what its supposed to do.  Its kind of cheap.  I dont think I would buy any of these in the future but it is good and does what it says it does.

Reviews.Title: Very Unreliable
Reviews.Author: Anca Maria Cunningham
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed with this product and thought at least my wasted time in installing it would be worth something if I could give you all a warning:  quite simply the audio often does not work, and when it does, the sound of anyone outside is very quiet, even if they are speaking right into the mic.  The video will also sometimes turn of when you push the talk button, Push to talk button often won't work, etc.  Very unreliable, don't waste your time like I did!  (Only by knowing that I have given others fair warning, can I feel this was not a complete waste of time)

Reviews.Title: Video intercom doorphone
Reviews.Author: 1slydude
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product and was very easy to install.  I has it up and running in about an hours time.  It's great security to see who is at your front door before you open it.

Reviews.Title: Very good value for the price
Reviews.Author: Socal1976dad
Reviews.Content: Just installed it a few weeks ago. Works great. easy to install. I wish the camera tilt upward had one more step (I had to use the existing audio-only location for the outdoor module, it's a little too low) but this is my problem, not the device.Not worth the extra $100 to get a color version, this is more than sufficient and half cheaper

Reviews.Title: Works as expected.
Reviews.Author: G. Torres
Reviews.Content: I have not finished installing the product, but when tested under the expected conditions, it does all that it advertises.  No issues with the audio as others have had, however, as I said before, it is as tested and not as installed yet.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: John1234
Reviews.Content: I don't review products often, if ever, but this video doorphone needs another good one. It's super easy to install and works great. I bought this one for my office and may buy another for my home.

Reviews.Title: I returned it - not as specified
Reviews.Author: n
Reviews.Content: I received this product several months ago - then returned it before any attempt at installation.Reason? The power supply and cord to the unit was black, instead of the depicted white.Who wants a black wire running up the wall?I envisioned the conversation at the factory..."Sir, we are out of the white power bricks like we advertise. The boss says 'We can't stop production - ship 'em with the black units and most of 'em won't complain."So - that was the end of any confidence I had in the product.I've no idea whether or not the product works.
